guild.description:
For memes and shitposting about everything that happens in our beloved "Official Ruqqus Discord"
 
---

## Posting Rules


Rule 1: 

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +askruqqus, +general, or +hub would gladly accept your questions.


Rule 2:

No spamming. Spamming would be considered any of the following:

* Same-format posting within a day

* Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)


Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.


Rule 3: 

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.

body:
Rule B5 ? LMAO is this the tax code or a chat room?  Fuck these rules and fuck discord. 

The benefit of this many rules is you can just ban whoever you dont like, because everyone will break a rule at some point.  The rules are not intended to be followed by the letter.

post.title: Kek broke the rules, why isnt he banned?

body: It's not a power trip when majority of the server doesn't appreciate your NSFW shitposting spam. A chat room must be subjectively moderated at some point and strike trolls and anti-community behavior. Impossible to have rules set in stone for a chat room since there's nuance and context to chat behavior. You're free to join another server where your NSFW spam is appreciated, discord is filled with it. You're not entitled to anything in the server.
body_html: It's not a power trip when majority of the server doesn't appreciate your NSFW shitposting spam. A chat room must be subjectively moderated at some point and strike trolls and anti-community behavior. Impossible to have rules set in stone for a chat room since there's nuance and context to chat behavior. You're free to join another server where your NSFW spam is appreciated, discord is filled with it. You're not entitled to anything in the server.

https://ruqqus.com/+DeuxRAMA/post/5515/how-to-survive-an-earthquake-within

So Kek will be banned when?
post.title: Kek broke the rules, why isnt he banned?

body: I didn't post anything NSFW.
body_html: I didn't post anything NSFW.

guild.description:
For memes and shitposting about everything that happens in our beloved "Official Ruqqus Discord"
 
---

## Posting Rules


Rule 1: 

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +askruqqus, +general, or +hub would gladly accept your questions.


Rule 2:

No spamming. Spamming would be considered any of the following:

* Same-format posting within a day

* Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)


Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.


Rule 3: 

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.

  • Same-format posting within a day

  • Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)

Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.

Rule 3:

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.
guild.name: RuqqusDiscord

parent.body: It's not a power trip when majority of the server doesn't appreciate your NSFW shitposting spam. A chat room must be subjectively moderated at some point and strike trolls and anti-community behavior. Impossible to have rules set in stone for a chat room since there's nuance and context to chat behavior. You're free to join another server where your NSFW spam is appreciated, discord is filled with it. You're not entitled to anything in the server.
parent.body_html: It's not a power trip when majority of the server doesn't appreciate your NSFW shitposting spam. A chat room must be subjectively moderated at some point and strike trolls and anti-community behavior. Impossible to have rules set in stone for a chat room since there's nuance and context to chat behavior. You're free to join another server where your NSFW spam is appreciated, discord is filled with it. You're not entitled to anything in the server.

Kek posted a screamer jump scare video, this one here that I reposted to ruqq:

https://ruqqus.com/+DeuxRAMA/post/5515/how-to-survive-an-earthquake-within

So Kek will be banned when?

post.title: Kek broke the rules, why isnt he banned?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: You could use the same excuse for a forum.
body_html: You could use the same excuse for a forum.

guild.description:
For memes and shitposting about everything that happens in our beloved "Official Ruqqus Discord"
 
---

## Posting Rules


Rule 1: 

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +askruqqus, +general, or +hub would gladly accept your questions.


Rule 2:

No spamming. Spamming would be considered any of the following:

* Same-format posting within a day

* Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)


Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.


Rule 3: 

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.
guild.description_html:
For memes and shitposting about everything that happens in our beloved "Official Ruqqus Discord"

Posting Rules

Rule 1:

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +AskRuqqus, +general, or +Hub would gladly accept your questions.

Rule 2:

No spamming. Spamming would be considered any of the following:

  • Same-format posting within a day

  • Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)

Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.

Rule 3:

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.
guild.name: RuqqusDiscord

parent.body: It's neither Reddit or Ruqqus. It's a chatroom. You can't have exact principled justice in a decent public chat room, trolls will reign in such environment.

body:
Nope, there's an upvote/downvote system as well as moderators for each guild.

If you don't agree, you can make a new guild just like you can make a new discord server as you please. You aren't entitled to freedom whithin a server/guild. The platform as a whole is where your freedom should be ensured.
body_html:
Nope, there's an upvote/downvote system as well as moderators for each guild.

If you don't agree, you can make a new guild just like you can make a new discord server as you please. You aren't entitled to freedom whithin a server/guild. The platform as a whole is where your freedom should be ensured.
